title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 § 8147.32 - Town of Islip
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 § 8147.32 - Town of Islip

State Regulations
(a) South Fourth

Street. South Fourth Street between Corbin Avenue and Cleveland Avenue; provided, however, that this route shall only be used between the hours of 7
p.m. and 7 a.m. (b) Corbin Avenue, a town highway, between South Fourth Street and Grand Boulevard, a distance of
0.2 mile, is designated as an access highway for special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this route shall only be used between the hours of 7
p.m. and 7 a.m. (c) Furrows Road. Furrows Road betwen Nicolls Road, CR 97, and Waverly Avenue. (d) Route 454. Route 454 between Interchange
57 and IR 495 and Connectiquot Avenue; provided, however, that this route shall
not be used between the hours of 7 a.m. and 9 a.m. and 4 p.m. to 6
p.m. (e) Connectiquot Avenue. Connectiquot Avenue between Route 495 and Windsor Place; provided, however, that this route shall not be used between the hours of 7 a.m. to 9 a.m. and 4
p.m. to 6 p.m. (f) Windsor Place. Windsor Place between Connectiquot Avenue and Allwood; provided, however, that
this route shall not be used between the hours of 7 a.m. to 9 a.m. and 4 p.m. to 6 p.m. (g) Allwood Avenue. Allwood Avenue between Windsor Place and the Yellow Freight Systems terminal; provided, however, that this route shall not be used between the hours of 7
a.m. and 9 a.m. and 4 p.m. to 6 p.m. (h) Cleveland Avenue. Cleveland Avenue
between South Fourth Street and Skip Lane; provided, however, that this route
shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (i) Skip Lane. Skip Lane between Cleveland

Avenue and the St. Johnsbury Trucking terminal, a distance of 0.1± mile; provided, however, that this route shall only be used between the hours of 7
p.m. and 7 a.m. (j) Long Island

Avenue between Commack Road (CR 4) and Rodeo Drive. (o) Rodeo Drive between Long Island Avenue
and Mercedes Way. (p) Route 454
between Connetquot Avenue and Route 27. (s) Route 111 between I-495 on CR
100. (t) CR 100 between Route 111
and Pathmark Facility, Brentwood. (u) Saxon Avenue between Route 27 and

Pathmark Facility, Bay Shore. (w) CR 97 (Nicolls Road) between Brookhaven/Islip town line and Route 27. (x) Route 27 between Broadway Avenue and CR
97 (Nicolls Road). (y) Broadway

Avenue between Route 454 and Penn Furniture Facility, 725 Broadway Avenue, Holbrook. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
§
8147.32

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
